item.title: BuBye Wordpress
item.description: A couple of days ago, I finally jumped ship. I moved away from Wordpress. My blog looks a lot simpler now. I should probably state that I have shamelessly copied the CSS style from Ant Zucaro. I’ll get around to modifying it to suit my needs. My last attempt to move from Wordpress, was a spectacular failure. That migration is the reason there are no blog posts between July and November 2010.
